mapper.select: select treat,doctor,rname,birth,phone, to_char(rdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')as rdate,memo,rno,confirm,time from reserve order by rno desc
select treat,doctor,rname,birth,phone, to_char(rdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')as rdate,memo,rno,confirm,time from reserve where rno = #{rno }
mapper.insert: insert into reserve (treat, doctor, rname, birth, phone, rdate,time, memo, rno) values (#{treat},#{doctor}, #{rname},#{birth}, #{phone}, #{rdate},#{time},#{memo},seq_reserve.nextval)
mapper.update: update reserve set treat=#{treat}, doctor=#{doctor}, rname=#{rname}, birth=#{birth}, phone=#{phone}, rdate=#{rdate}, time=#{time}, memo=#{memo} where rno=#{rno}
update reserve set confirm=#{confirm} where rno=#{rno}
